clusters.title: Global Reach
clusters.description: TikTok has rapidly expanded its global presence, boasting over 2 billion users worldwide and availability in more than 160 countries. In the United States, TikTok has more than 150 million users and significantly contributes to the economy, with a $24 billion impact and creating 200,000 jobs in 2023. Despite its popularity, TikTok faces challenges such as being surpassed by Instagram as the most downloaded app in 2023 and a complete ban in India, affecting 200 million users. The platform continues to invest in security, with a $1.5 billion investment in TikTok US Data Security.

clusters.title: Influencer Earnings
clusters.description: Charli D’Amelio is one of the leading TikTok influencers with over 150 million followers and earnings estimated at $17.5 million. Other prominent figures include Dixie D’Amelio, earning $10 million, and Addison Rae with over 88 million followers and earnings of $8.5 million. Several creators and companies have amassed millions of followers and likes, highlighting their significant presence on the platform. This underscores the substantial reach and financial success achievable on TikTok by American influencers.

clusters.title: Public Sentiments
clusters.description: The Protecting Americans from Foreign Adversary Controlled Applications Act was passed with strong support in both the House and Senate. Public opinion on banning TikTok varies, with 50% of Americans supporting the ban, while 22% oppose it and 28% remain unsure. Among TikTok users, opposition to the ban is higher, with 56% against it and only 19% in favor. Influencer demographics on TikTok show a predominance of female influencers, with varying engagement strategies between genders, such as humor and self-disclosure. Additionally, a notable 19.4% of TikTok videos reportedly contain misinformation.

clusters.title: U.S. Expansion
clusters.description: TikTok has seen substantial growth in the U.S., with usage jumping from 21% to 33% among adults since 2021. The platform has over 170 million users in the country and has contributed significantly to the U.S. economy, including $24 billion and 200,000 jobs in 2023. Despite being overtaken by Instagram as the most downloaded app in 2023, TikTok continues to influence cultural trends, with a significant portion of users attributing original content to the platform. Downloads have also surged globally, reflecting its expansive reach and impact.
